trans-unit.source: Deletes all handwritten ink annotations in the document.
trans-unit.target: 删除文档中的所有手写墨迹批注。

trans-unit.source: To work with ink annotations, you must be running Microsoft Office Word on a tablet computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用墨迹批注，您必须运行 Microsoft Office Word 的 tablet 计算机上。

trans-unit.source: For more information on adding handwritten ink annotations to a document, see "Mark up a document with ink annotations" in Microsoft Office Word Help.
trans-unit.target: 向文档添加手写的墨迹注释的详细信息，请参阅"标记具有墨迹批注的文档"Microsoft Office Word 帮助中。

trans-unit.source: Analyzes the text in the document to determine the language that it is written in.
trans-unit.target: 分析文档中的文本以确定它的编写语言。

trans-unit.source: The results of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DetectLanguage%2A> method are stored in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.LanguageID%2A> property on a character by character basis.
trans-unit.target: 结果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DetectLanguage%2A>方法存储在<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.LanguageID%2A>基于字符的字符的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DetectLanguage%2A> method checks all available text in the document (headers, footers, text boxes, and so forth).
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DetectLanguage%2A>方法检查文档 （标头、 页脚、 文本框中，和等） 中的所有可用的文本。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DetectLanguage%2A> method has already been applied to the specified text, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.LanguageDetected%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DetectLanguage%2A>方法已应用到指定的文本，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.LanguageDetected%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: To re-evaluate the language of the specified text, you must first set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.LanguageDetected%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新评估指定的文本的语言，必须首先设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.LanguageDetected%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all features introduced after the version specified in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> property are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否禁用在 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> 属性中指定的版本之后引入的所有功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all features introduced after the version specified in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> property are disabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> 属性中指定的版本之后引入的所有功能已禁用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects the document for which you set the property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只影响为其设置属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: Use this property if you plan on sharing a document between users with earlier versions of Microsoft Office Word, so you do not introduce features that are not available in their versions of Word.
trans-unit.target: 如果你打算共享与早期版本的 Microsoft Office Word 中，因此不引入其版本的 Word 中均不提供的功能的用户之间的文档，请使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DisableFeaturesbyDefault%2A> property to disable in all documents features introduced after a specified version.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DisableFeaturesbyDefault%2A>属性禁用在所有文档后，将指定的版本推出的功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether all features introduced after a specified version of Microsoft Office Word are disabled in the document only.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在指定版本的 Microsoft Office Word 之后引入的所有功能是否仅在该文档中禁用。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DisableFeatures%2A> property must be set to `true` prior to setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DisableFeatures%2A>属性必须设置为`true`之前设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the setting will not take effect and will remain at its default setting of Word 97 for Windows.
trans-unit.target: 否则为设置才会生效，并且将保持为其的 Word 97 适用于 Windows 的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter%2A> property only affects the document for which the property is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter%2A>属性只影响该属性设置的文档。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set a global option for the application to disable features for all documents, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfterbyDefault%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要设置要禁用的所有文档的功能，请使用的应用程序的全局选项<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfterbyDefault%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example disables all features added after Word for Windows 95, versions 7.0 and 7.0a, for the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例禁用添加后 Word 对于 Windows 95，所有功能的版本 7.0 和 7.0 a，文档。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase" /> 占用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Dispose%2A> method yourself.
trans-unit.target: 不要调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Dispose%2A>方法自己。

trans-unit.source: When the document in a document-level customization is closed, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] cleans up all resources used by the customization.
trans-unit.target: 当关闭的文档级自定义项中的文档时，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]清理使用自定义项的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Dispose%2A> method, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Dispose%2A>方法，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentInspectors" /> object that you can use to locate hidden personal information, such as author name, company name, and revision date.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentInspectors" /> 对象，使用该对象可以查找隐藏的个人信息（如作者姓名、公司名称和修订日期）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentInspectors" /> object that you can use to locate hidden personal information, such as author name, company name, and revision date.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentInspectors" /> 对象，使用该对象可以查找隐藏的个人信息（如作者姓名、公司名称和修订日期）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example iterates through the document inspectors.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例循环访问文档检查器。

trans-unit.source: The code inspects each inspector and shows a message box that displays the name of the inspector, and the status and results of the inspection.
trans-unit.target: 该代码将检查每个检查器，然后显示一个消息框，显示该检查器的状态和检查结果的名称。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions" />collection that represents the collection of versions of a shared document that has versioning enabled and that is stored in a document library on a server.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions" /> 集合，表示一个共享文档的版本集合，该共享文档启用了版本控制，并且存储在服务器的文档库中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message that shows the total number of document versions if versioning is enabled in the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一条消息，如果启用版本控制文档中显示的文档版本总数。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Microsoft Office theme that is applied to the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用于文档的 Microsoft Office 主题。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.OfficeTheme" /> object that represents the Microsoft Office theme that is applied to the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.OfficeTheme" /> 对象，表示应用于文档的 Microsoft Office 主题。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ApplyDocumentTheme%2A> method to apply a Microsoft Office theme to the document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ApplyDocumentTheme%2A>方法以将 Microsoft Office 主题应用到文档。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the current document theme and its corresponding font scheme.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检索当前的文档主题和其相应的字体方案。

trans-unit.source: The code then retrieves and displays the names of the major font and the minor font of the Latin font face in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，代码检索，并在消息框中显示的主要字体和次要拉丁字体的字体名称。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word embeds common system fonts.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否嵌入常见的系统字体。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word does not embed common system fonts; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 不嵌入常见的系统字体，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` is useful if the user is on an East Asian system and wants to create a document that is readable by others who do not have fonts for that language on their system.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`false`如果用户位于东亚语言系统，并且想要创建的其他用户不具有针对其系统上的该语言的字体可读的文档非常有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, a user on a Japanese system could choose to embed the fonts in a document so that the Japanese document would be readable on all systems.
trans-unit.target: 例如，日语系统上的用户可以选择要在文档中嵌入字体，以便日语文档可在所有系统上可读。

trans-unit.source: Changes a document to the Word 97-2003 document format so that it can be edited in a previous version of Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 将文档更改为 Word 97-2003 文档格式，以便可以在以前版本的 Microsoft Office Word 中对其进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Email" /> object that contains all the e-mail–related properties of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Email" /> 对象，该对象包含与电子邮件相关的所有文档属性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Email" /> object that contains all the e-mail–related properties of the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Email" /> 对象，包含与电子邮件相关的所有文档属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the name of the style associated with the current e-mail author.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示与当前的电子邮件作者相关联的样式的名称。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that the document is an unsent forward, reply, or new e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 此代码假定该文档是尚未发送的转发、 答复，还是新的电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word embeds speech and handwriting and controls text service data received from devices connected to Microsoft Office using the Windows Text Service Framework Application Programming Interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否嵌入语音和手写功能，以及是否控制通过 Windows Text Service Framework 应用程序编程接口从连接到 Microsoft Office 的设备接收的文本服务数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word embeds speech and handwriting and controls text service data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 嵌入语音和手写功能并控制文本服务数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Office Word embeds speech and handwriting so that data can be converted back to speech or handwriting and to store East Asian IME keystrokes to improve correction.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 将嵌入到语音转换和手写，以便可以将数据转换回语音或手写以及存储的东亚 IME 击键以提高更正。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word embeds TrueType fonts in a document when the document is saved.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 在保存文档时是否在文档中嵌入 TrueType 字体。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word embeds TrueType fonts in a document when the document is saved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 在保存文档时在文档中嵌入 TrueType 字体，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Embedding TrueType fonts allows others to view the document with the same fonts that were used to create it.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入 TrueType 字体，其他人查看该文档可与用于创建它的相同字体。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the algorithm encryption provider that Microsoft Office Word uses when encrypting documents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Microsoft Office Word 在加密文档时使用的算法加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the algorithm encryption provider that Microsoft Office Word uses when encrypting documents.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 在加密文档时使用的算法加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> collection that represents all the endnotes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有尾注。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> collection that represents all the endnotes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有尾注。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds text to the first paragraph and then adds an endnote to the second word.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将文本添加到第一个段落，然后将尾注添加到第二个字。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Terminates a review of a file that has been sent for review using the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendForReview(System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@)" /> method or that has been automatically placed in a review cycle by sending a document to another user in an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 终止对某个文件的审阅，该文件已经发送以进行审阅（通过使用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendForReview(System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@)" /> 方法），或者已经自动置于审阅阶段（通过以电子邮件形式将文档发送给另一个用户）。

trans-unit.source: When executed, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.EndReview%2A> method displays a message asking the user whether to end the review.
trans-unit.target: 在执行时，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.EndReview%2A>方法会显示一条消息询问用户是否结束审阅。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether formatting restrictions are enforced in a protected document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否在受保护的文档中实施格式设置限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if formatting restrictions are enforced in a protected document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在受保护文档中实施格式设置限制，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Envelope" /> that represents envelope functionality and the envelope in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示文档中信封功能和信封的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Envelope" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Envelope" /> that represents envelope functionality and the envelope in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示文档中信封功能和信封的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Envelope" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default envelope size to C4 (229 x 324 mm).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将默认信封大小设置为 C4 (229 x 324 mm)。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the new PDF or XPS file.
trans-unit.target: 新 PDF 或 XPS 文件的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportFormat" /> values that specifies whether to save the document in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportFormat" /> 值之一，指定是以 PDF 还是 XPS 格式保存文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to open the new file automatically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要自动打开新文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportOptimizeFor" /> values that specifies whether to optimize for screen or print.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportOptimizeFor" /> 值之一，指定进行屏幕优化还是打印优化。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange" /> values that specifies whether the export range is the entire document, the current page, a range of text, or the current selection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange" /> 值之一，指定导出范围是整个文档、当前页、文本范围还是当前选定内容。

trans-unit.source: The default is to export the entire document.
trans-unit.target: 默认设置为导出整个文档。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the starting page number, if the <c>Range</c> parameter is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange.wdExportFromTo" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定起始页码（如果 <c>Range</c> 参数设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange.wdExportFromTo" />）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the ending page number, if the <c>Range</c> parameter is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange.wdExportFromTo" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定结束页码（如果 <c>Range</c> 参数设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange.wdExportFromTo" />）。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportItem" /> values that specifies whether the export process includes text only or includes text with markup.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportItem" /> 值之一，指定导出过程是仅包括文本，还是同时包括文本和标记。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include document properties in the new file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在新文件中包含文档属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to copy Information Rights Management (IRM) permissions to an XPS document if the source document has IRM protections; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在源文档具有信息权限管理 (IRM) 保护时将 IRM 权限复制到 XPS 文档，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportCreateBookmarks" /> values that specifies whether to export bookmarks and the type of bookmarks to export.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportCreateBookmarks" /> 值之一，指定是否导出书签以及要导出的书签类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include extra data to help screen readers, such as information about the flow and logical organization of the content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包含额外数据（如有关内容的流和逻辑组织的信息）来协助使用屏幕读取器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include a bitmap of the text; <see langword="false" /> to reference the text font.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包含文本的位图，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要引用文本字体，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this parameter to <see langword="true" /> when font licenses do not permit a font to be embedded in the PDF file.
trans-unit.target: 如果字体许可证不允许在 PDF 文件中嵌入某种字体，则将此参数设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set this to <see langword="false" />, the viewer's computer substitutes an appropriate font if the specified one is not available.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此参数设置为 <see langword="false" />，则当指定字体不可用时，查看者的计算机会替换合适的字体。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to limit PDF usage to the PDF subset standardized as ISO 19005-1; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要将 PDF 使用范围限制为按照 ISO 19005-1 进行标准化的 PDF 子集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set this parameter to <see langword="true" />, the resulting files are more reliably self-contained but may be larger or show more visual artifacts due to the restrictions of the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此参数设置为 <see langword="true" />，则生成的文件会是更加可靠的独立文件，但这些文件可能会更大，或者由于格式限制而显示更多的视觉瑕疵。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an implementation of the <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> interface that enables the document to be saved in a different fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 一个指针，指向使文档能够以其他固定格式保存的 <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> 接口的实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Extending the Office (2007) Fixed-Format Export Feature.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅“扩展 Office (2007) 固定格式导出功能”。

trans-unit.source: Saves the document in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: 以 PDF 或 XPS 格式保存文档。

trans-unit.source: You can save as a PDF or XPS file from Microsoft Office Word only after you install an add-in that provides this feature.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将保存为 PDF 或 XPS 文件从 Microsoft Office Word 仅后提供此功能的外接程序安装。

trans-unit.source: For more information, search for "Enable support for other file formats, such as PDF and XPS" on Office Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，搜索"启用支持对其他文件格式，例如 PDF 和 XPS"Office online。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example saves the current document in PDF format with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将当前的文档保存在具有指定名称的 PDF 格式。

trans-unit.source: Because no folder is specified, the PDF file is saved in the user's My Documents folder by default.
trans-unit.target: 因为未不指定任何文件夹，则 PDF 文件默认保存在用户的 My Documents 文件夹中。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFarEastLineBreakLanguageID" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets Microsoft Office Word to break lines in the current document based on Korean language rules.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置 Microsoft Office Word 在朝鲜语语言规则基于当前文档中换行。

trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFarEastLineBreakLevel" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Paragraph.FarEastLineBreakControl%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Paragraph.FarEastLineBreakControl%2A> 属性设置为 `false`，则忽略此属性。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个只读 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Fields" /> 集合，该集合包含主文档内容中的字段。

trans-unit.target: 一个只读 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Fields" /> 集合，表示主文档内容中的所有字段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a date field to the first paragraph in the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将日期字段添加到文档中的第一个段落。

trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the document is final.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文档是否处于最终状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document is final; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档处于最终状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, Microsoft Office Word marks the document as final, notifies recipients (if any) that the document is final, and sets the document to read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为`true`，Microsoft Office Word 将标记为最终状态的文档，通知收件人，（如果有），该文档处于最终状态，并将文档设置为只读的。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Final%2A> property of the current document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检索<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Final%2A>当前文档的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the document is not already final, the code shows a message that informs the user that the document is not final, and then sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Final%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该文档不是已最终的代码将显示一条消息，通知用户文档不是最终版本，并随后设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Final%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Word also displays a message before the document is marked final.
trans-unit.target: 在文档标记最终之前，Word 还显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: If the document is already final, the code shows a message that informs the user that the document is already final.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档已最终，此代码将显示一条消息，告知用户文档已经是最终版本。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Decreases the font size of text just enough so that the document will fit on one fewer pages.
trans-unit.target: 将文本的字号减至足够小，以便将文档放在尽可能少的页上。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if Microsoft Office Word is unable to reduce the page count by one.
trans-unit.target: 异常是由一个引发如果 Microsoft Office Word 无法减少页计数。

trans-unit.source: The address of the target document.
trans-unit.target: 目标文档的地址。

trans-unit.source: The location within the target document.
trans-unit.target: 目标文档中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the target location in a new window.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在新窗口中显示目标位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add the link to the current day's history folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则添加指向当前日期的历史记录文件夹的链接。

trans-unit.source: A string or a byte array that specifies additional information for HTTP to use to resolve the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串或字节数组，为 HTTP 指定要用来解析超链接的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use <c>ExtraInfo</c> to specify the coordinates of an image map, the contents of a form, or a FAT file name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用 <c>ExtraInfo</c> 指定图像映射的坐标、窗体的内容或 FAT 文件名。

trans-unit.source: The string is either posted or appended, depending on the value of <c>Method</c>.
trans-unit.target: 字符串可以发送，也可以追加，具体情况取决于 <c>Method</c> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Hyperlink.ExtraInfoRequired" /> property to determine whether extra information is required.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Hyperlink.ExtraInfoRequired" /> 属性确定是否需要额外的信息。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the way additional information for HTTP is handled.
trans-unit.target: 指定其他 HTTP 信息的处理方式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoExtraInfoMethod" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoExtraInfoMethod" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies header information for the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定 HTTP 请求的标头信息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, you can combine several header lines into a single string by using the following syntax: "string1 <see langword="" & vbCr & "" />string2 ".
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中，可以通过使用如下语法将几个标题行合并到一个字符串中：“string1 <see langword="" & vbCr & "" />string2 ”。

trans-unit.source: The specified string is automatically converted into ANSI characters.
trans-unit.target: 指定的字符串自动转换为 ANSI 字符。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <c>Heade</c>rInfo argument might overwrite default HTTP header fields.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<c>HeaderInfo</c> 参数可以覆盖默认的 HTTP 标头字段。

trans-unit.source: Resolves a hyperlink, or displays a cached document if the document has already been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 解析超链接，或者如果文档已经下载的话，则显示缓存的文档。

trans-unit.source: This method displays the cached document located at the `Address` parameter, if it has already been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会显示对缓存的文档位于`Address`参数，如果已下载。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method resolves the hyperlink, downloads the target document, and displays the document in the appropriate application.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法解析超链接，下载目标文档并在适当的应用程序中显示此文档。

trans-unit.source: If the hyperlink uses the file protocol, this method opens the document instead of downloading it.
trans-unit.target: 如果超链接使用文件协议，此方法将打开的文档而不是下载它。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word displays font formatting in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否在“样式和格式”任务窗格中显示字体格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word shows the next heading level when the previous heading level is used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否在使用上一个标题级别时显示下一个标题级别。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true " />if Word shows the next heading level when the previous heading level is used; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于**之前级别使用时显示下一个标题**中的复选框**样式窗格选项**对话框。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word displays paragraph formatting in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否在“样式和格式”任务窗格中显示段落格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word displays paragraph formatting in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果 Microsoft Office Word 显示中的段落格式设置**样式和格式**任务窗格中; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to show user-defined styles.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示用户定义的样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true " />to show user-defined styles; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示用户定义的样式，则为 <see langword="true " />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the **Hide built-in name when alternate name exists** check box in the **Style Pane Options** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于**隐藏内置名称存在替换名称时**中的复选框**样式窗格选项**对话框。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.FormattingShowUserStyleName%2A> property to `true` hides built-in styles when alternate user-defined styles exist.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.FormattingShowUserStyleName%2A>属性`true`时备用用户定义的样式存在隐藏内置样式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user creates a heading style with the same name as a built-in style, the user-defined style takes precedence and the built-in style is not shown in the list of style names.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户具有相同名称作为内置样式创建标题样式，则用户定义的样式优先，内置的样式的样式名称的列表中不会显示。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.

trans-unit.source: Called by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] to get an object that can be used by VBA code in the document.

trans-unit.source: An object in a document-level customization that can be used by VBA code in the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档级自定义项中的一个对象，可由文档中的 VBA 代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return an instance of a class that you have exposed to VBA code in the document.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以返回向文档中的 VBA 代码公开的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceType" /> values that specifies the type of item you want to insert a cross-reference to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceType" /> 值之一，用于指定项（要插入对该项的交叉引用）的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of items that can be cross-referenced based on the specified cross-reference type.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可基于指定的交叉引用类型进行交叉引用的项数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of items that can be cross-referenced based on the specified cross-reference type.
trans-unit.target: 一个可基于指定的交叉引用类型进行交叉引用的项数组。

trans-unit.source: The array corresponds to the items listed in the **For which** box in the **Cross-reference** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该数组对应于中列出的项**为其**框中**交叉引用**对话框。

trans-unit.source: An item returned by this method can be used as the `ReferenceWhich` argument for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertCrossReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的项可用作`ReferenceWhich`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertCrossReference%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the workflow tasks that are assigned to the document.

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.WorkflowTasks" /> 集合，包含分配给文档的工作流任务。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the number of workflow tasks that are currently associated with the document.

trans-unit.source: The example then iterates through each workflow task, if any, and shows some selected task properties in a message box.

trans-unit.source: To add workflow tasks to your document, you must publish the document to an Office Sharepoint Server site.
trans-unit.target: 若要向文档添加工作流任务，必须将文档发布到 Office Sharepoint Server 站点。

trans-unit.source: The kind of item to which the range or selection is moved.
trans-unit.target: 要将范围或选定内容移到其中的项的种类。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The item to which the range or selection is moved.
trans-unit.target: 要将范围或选定内容移到其中的项。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The number of the item in the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档中项的编号。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Only positive values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 只有正数值才有效。

trans-unit.source: To specify an item that precedes the range or selection, use <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection.wdGoToPrevious" /> as the <c>Which</c> argument and specify a <c>Count</c> value.
trans-unit.target: 要指定位于范围或选定内容前面的项，请将 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection.wdGoToPrevious" /> 用作 <c>Which</c> 参数并指定 <c>Count</c> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>What</c> argument is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToBookmark" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToComment" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToField" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToObject" />, this argument specifies a name.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>What</c> 参数是 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToBookmark" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToComment" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToField" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToObject" />，则此参数指定一个名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> that represents the start position of the specified item, such as a page, bookmark, or field.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示指定项（如页、书签或字段）的起始位置的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> that represents the start position of the specified item, such as a page, bookmark, or field.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示指定项（如页、书签或字段）的起始位置的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: When you use this method with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToGrammaticalError>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToProofreadingError>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToSpellingError> constant, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range> that is returned includes any grammar error text or spelling error text.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用此方法与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToGrammaticalError>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToProofreadingError>，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToSpellingError>常量，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>返回包括任何语法错误的文本或拼写错误的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a grammar check has been run on the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否已针对文档运行语法检查。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a grammar check has been run on the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已针对文档运行语法检查，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To recheck the grammar in the document, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.GrammarChecked%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新检查文档中的语法，将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.GrammarChecked%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> collection that represents the sentences that failed the grammar check on the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中未通过语法检查的句子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> collection that represents the sentences that failed the grammar check on the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> 集合，表示文档中未通过语法检查的句子。

trans-unit.source: There can be more than one error per sentence.
trans-unit.target: 可以有多个错误，每个句子。

trans-unit.source: If there are no grammatical errors, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors.Count%2A> property for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors> object returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.GrammaticalErrors%2A> property returns 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何语法错误，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors.Count%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors>返回对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.GrammaticalErrors%2A>属性都返回 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: This property is most useful in programmatically determining whether a document needs to be saved into a macro-enabled file format.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是在以编程方式确定是否需要为启用宏的文件格式保存文档中最有用。

trans-unit.source: If saved in another format, macros and code projects contained within the document may be lost.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether words in all capital letters can be hyphenated.

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置断字区域的宽度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The width of the hyphenation zone, in points.
trans-unit.target: 断字区域的宽度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The hyphenation zone is the maximum amount of space that Microsoft Office Word leaves between the end of the last word in a line and the right margin.
trans-unit.target: 连字区域是空间的最大的 Microsoft Office Word 离开的行中最后一个单词末尾和右边距之间量。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例启用自动断字功能文档，并设置连字区域为 36 磅 （0.5 英寸）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> that represents the underlying native object for the document host item that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" />，它表示此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase" /> 所表示的文档宿主项的基础本机对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> that represents the underlying native object for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase" /> 的基础本机对象。

trans-unit.source: You cannot pass a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase> object to a method or property in the Word object model that expects a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 不能将传递<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase>到方法或要求 Word 对象模型中的属性的对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.InnerObject%2A> property to access the underlying <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>, and then you can pass this object to a method or property that expects a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.InnerObject%2A>属性来访问基础<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>，然后将此对象传递给方法或属性需要<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programmatic Limitations of Host Items and Host Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[限制的主机项和主机控件编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the document is a master document.

trans-unit.target: 如果该文档是主控文档，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A master document includes one or more subdocuments.
trans-unit.target: 主文档包括一个或多个子文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the document is opened in a separate document window as a subdocument of a master document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示是否在一个单独的文档窗口中以主控文档的子文档形式打开文档。

trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 自动缩紧文档中的半宽拉丁字符和标点符号，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDocumentKind" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置 Word 时自动格式设置为的号文档使用的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word has detected the language of the text in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否检测到文档中文本的语言。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Word has detected the language of the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Word 检测到文档的语言，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.LanguageID%2A> property for the results of any previous language detection.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.LanguageID%2A>的结果的任何以前的语言检测的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.LanguageDetected%2A> property is set to `true` when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DetectLanguage%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.LanguageDetected%2A>属性设置为`true`时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.DetectLanguage%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: To reevaluate the language of the specified text, you must first set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.LanguageDetected%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新计算指定的文本的语言，必须首先设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.LanguageDetected%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Locks the document on the server, which prevents anyone else from editing it.
trans-unit.target: 锁定服务器上的文档，这可阻止其他任何人对其进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: This method applies only to documents stored on a server that is running Microsoft Office SharePoint Server.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅适用于运行 Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 的服务器上存储的文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can change the document theme.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以更改文档主题。

trans-unit.target: 如果用户可以更改文档主题，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ApplyDocumentTheme%2A>方法以将 Microsoft Office 主题应用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.MailMerge" /> that represents the mail merge functionality for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示文档的邮件合并功能的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.MailMerge" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.MailMerge" /> that represents the mail merge functionality for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示文档的邮件合并功能的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.MailMerge" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.MailMerge> object is available regardless of whether the specified document is a mail merge main document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.MailMerge>对象都不可用，无论指定的文档是否邮件合并主文档。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.MailMerge.State%2A> property to determine the current state of the mail merge operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.MailMerge.State%2A>属性来确定邮件合并操作的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens a data source and then merges the document with the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开数据源，然后合并与数据源的文档。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that you have a data source called test.mdb saved at the root of the C directory.
trans-unit.target: 此代码假定你具有调用 test.mdb 保存在 C 目录的根目录的数据源。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after all records in a mail merge have merged successfully.
trans-unit.target: 在邮件合并中的所有记录已成功合并之后发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.MailMergeAfterMerge> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一条消息时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.MailMergeAfterMerge>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after each record in the data source successfully merges in a mail merge.
trans-unit.target: 在数据源中的每个记录成功合并到一个邮件合并中之后发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.MailMergeAfterRecordMerge> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一条消息时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.MailMergeAfterRecordMerge>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a merge is executed, before any records merge.
trans-unit.target: 在合并任何记录之前于执行合并时发生。

trans-unit.source: To stop the mail merge process, set the `Cancel` argument of the provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止邮件合并进程，设置`Cancel`所提供的自变量<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message before any manual mail merge is run.
trans-unit.target: 运行任何手动邮件合并之前，下面的代码示例将显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs as a merge is executed for the individual records in a merge.
trans-unit.target: 在针对合并中的个别记录执行合并时发生。

trans-unit.source: To stop the mail merge process for the current record, set the `Cancel` argument of the provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止当前记录的邮件合并进程，设置`Cancel`所提供的自变量<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies where Microsoft Office Word places binary operators when equations span two or more lines.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在公式跨越两行或更多行时 Microsoft Office Word 放置二元运算符的位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: When the equation breaks on a binary operator—for example, an addition, subtraction, or multiplication operator—there are three different placements of the operator: before the break, after the break, and repeated both before and after the break.
trans-unit.target: 公式时将在一个二元运算符处中断 — 例如，加法、 减法或乘法运算符 — 有三个不同的运算符的放置方式： 换行符之前、 之后、 在换行，并且重复之前和之后中断。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakSub%2A> property to specify how Word treats subtraction operators that appear before a line break.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakSub%2A>属性来指定如何 Word 将出现在行中断之前的减法运算符。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakBin%2A> property to a value that causes the binary operator that the equation breaks on to repeat at the beginning of the new line.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakBin%2A>属性的值，以使二元运算符公式换到重复的新行的开头。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the code sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakSub%2A> property to a value that converts the sequence of two subtraction operators to a sequence of a plus operator followed by a minus operator.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该代码将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakSub%2A>属性将两个减法运算符的序列转换为的加运算符序列的值后跟一个减号运算符。

trans-unit.source: This prevents double negatives from being created when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakBin%2A> property is set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>, which repeats the subtraction operator at the equation break.
trans-unit.target: 这可以防止两个负值正在创建时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakBin%2A>属性设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>，用于重复减法运算符在公式换行。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how Microsoft Office Word handles a subtraction operator that falls before a line break.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 Microsoft Office Word 如何处理位于换行符之前的减法运算符。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakSub" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakSub" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This property is used only when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakBin%2A> property is set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性仅当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakBin%2A>属性设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>。

trans-unit.source: Subtraction sometimes receives special treatment when a line break falls on a subtraction operator and the document setting is to repeat the subtraction operator on the following line, because two negatives make a positive.
trans-unit.target: 换行符落在减法运算符上和文档设置为重复减法运算符上的以下行，因为两个减号得正时，有时减法接收特殊处理。

trans-unit.source: Some writers choose to convert one of the minus signs into a plus sign, and some choose to keep the two negatives.
trans-unit.target: 某些编写器选择一个减号转换加号，而某些选择保留两个减号。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakBin%2A> property to a value that causes the binary operator that the equation breaks on to repeat at the beginning of the new line.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakBin%2A>属性的值，以使二元运算符公式换到重复的新行的开头。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the code sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakSub%2A> property to a value that converts the sequence of two subtraction operators to a sequence of a plus operator followed by a minus operator.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该代码将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakSub%2A>属性将两个减法运算符的序列转换为的加运算符序列的值后跟一个减号运算符。

trans-unit.source: This prevents double negatives from being created when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakBin%2A> property is set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>, which repeats the subtraction operator at the equation break.
trans-unit.target: 这可以防止两个负值正在创建时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.OMathBreakBin%2A>属性设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>，用于重复减法运算符在公式换行。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word optimizes the document for viewing in Word 97 by disabling any incompatible formatting.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否通过禁用任何不兼容的格式来优化要在 Word 97 中查看的文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word optimizes the document for viewing in Word 97 by disabling any incompatible formatting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 通过禁用任何不兼容的格式来优化要在 Word 97 中查看的文档，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To optimize all new documents for Word 97 by default, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.OptimizeForWord97byDefault%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Gets the title of the original document after performing a legal-blackline document compare operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取执行显示更改的文档比较操作后的原始文档的标题。

trans-unit.source: The title of the original document after performing a legal-blackline document compare operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行显示更改的文档比较操作后的原始文档的标题。

trans-unit.source: To perform a legal-blackline document compare operation, use the `CompareDocuments` method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Application%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行精确比较文档的比较操作，使用`CompareDocuments`方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Application%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example compares the Word document in the document-level customization (called the original document) with another version of the same document (called the revised document).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将在文档级自定义项 （称为原始文档） 与同一文档 （称为修订过的文档） 的另一个版本的 Word 文档进行比较。

trans-unit.source: It places the result of the comparison into the original document.
trans-unit.target: 它将比较的结果放到原始文档中。

trans-unit.source: The example then notifies the user whether the title of the original document and the title of the revised document are identical or different and displays both document titles.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后通知用户，无论原始文档的标题和修改后的文档的标题是相同还是不同，显示这两个文档标题。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: A password that must be supplied to open the document.

trans-unit.source: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications.
trans-unit.target: 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法，以指定 Word 是否对文件属性受密码保护的文档进行加密。

trans-unit.source: The name of the algorithm encryption provider that Microsoft Office Word uses when encrypting documents with passwords.

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法，以指定 Word 用密码对文档加密时使用的算法加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的密码加密选项如果正在使用的密码加密算法不是"Microsoft RSA SChannel Cryptographic Provider。"

trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the disk or Web path of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的磁盘路径或 Web 路径。

trans-unit.source: The disk or Web path of the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档的磁盘路径或 Web 路径。

trans-unit.source: The path does not include a trailing character—for example, "C:\MSOffice" or "http://MyServer".
trans-unit.target: 路径不包括尾随字符-例如，"C:\MSOffice"或"http://MyServer"。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A> property to add the character that separates folders and drive letters.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A>属性来添加分隔文件夹和驱动器号的字符。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Name%2A> property to return the file name without the path and use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.FullName%2A> property to return the file name and the path together.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Name%2A>属性以返回无的路径和使用的文件名<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.FullName%2A>属性一起返回的文件名和路径。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A> property to build Web addresses even though they contain forward slashes (/) and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A> property defaults to a backslash (\\).
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A>属性来生成 Web 地址，即使它们包含正斜杠 （/） 和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A>属性默认为反斜杠 (\\)。

trans-unit.source: Opens Microsoft Office PowerPoint with the document loaded.
trans-unit.target: 打开 Microsoft Office PowerPoint 并加载该文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word prints onto a preprinted form only the data entered in the corresponding online form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否仅将在相应的联机窗体中输入的数据打印到预打印的窗体上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word prints onto a preprinted form only the data entered in the corresponding online form; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 仅将在相应的联机窗体中输入的数据打印到预打印的窗体上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the document is formatted to use fractional point spacing to display and print characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文档的格式是否被设置为使用小数点间距来显示和打印字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document is formatted to use fractional point spacing to display and print characters; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档的格式被设置为使用小数点间距来显示和打印字符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have the customization code continue while Microsoft Office Word prints the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则可以让自定义代码在 Microsoft Office Word 打印文档时继续工作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to append the document to the file specified by the <c>OutputFileName</c> argument; <see langword="false" /> to overwrite the contents of <c>OutputFileName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则会将文档追加到 <c>OutputFileName</c> 参数指定的文件；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则会覆盖 <c>OutputFileName</c> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: The page range.
trans-unit.target: 页面范围。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If <c>PrintToFile</c> is <see langword="true" />, this argument specifies the path and file name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>PrintToFile</c> 为 <see langword="true" />，则此参数指定输出文件的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: The starting page number when <c>Range</c> is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange.wdPrintFromTo" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <c>Range</c> 设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange.wdPrintFromTo" /> 时的起始页码。

trans-unit.source: The ending page number when <c>Range</c> is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange.wdPrintFromTo" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <c>Range</c> 设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange.wdPrintFromTo" /> 时的结束页码。

trans-unit.source: The item to be printed.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的项。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutItem" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutItem" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to be printed.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的份数。

trans-unit.source: The page numbers and page ranges to be printed, separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的页码和页码范围，由逗号分隔。

trans-unit.source: For example, "2, 6-10" prints page 2 and pages 6 through 10.
trans-unit.target: 例如，“2, 6-10”将打印第 2 页以及从第 6 页到第 10 页之间的内容。

trans-unit.source: The type of pages to be printed.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的页面的类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutPages" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutPages" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to send printer instructions to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将打印机指令发送到文件。

trans-unit.source: Make sure to specify a file name with <c>OutputFileName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 请确保使用 <c>OutputFileName</c> 指定一个文件名。

trans-unit.source: When printing multiple copies of a document, <see langword="true" /> to print all pages of the document before printing the next copy.
trans-unit.target: 在打印多份文档时，如果为 <see langword="true" />，则先打印该文档的所有页，然后再打印下一份。

trans-unit.source: This argument is available only in Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.
trans-unit.target: 此参数只在 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本中可用。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about this argument, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.
trans-unit.target: 有关此参数的其他信息，请参阅 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本附带的语言参考帮助。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to print a two-sided document on a printer without a duplex printing kit.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在没有双面打印装置的打印机上打印双面文档。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is <see langword="true" />, the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintBackground" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintReverse" /> properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数为 <see langword="true" />，则忽略 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintBackground" /> 和 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintReverse" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintOddPagesInAscendingOrder" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintEvenPagesInAscendingOrder" /> properties to control the output during manual duplex printing.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintOddPagesInAscendingOrder" /> 和 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintEvenPagesInAscendingOrder" /> 属性在手动进行双面打印时控制输出。

trans-unit.source: This argument might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可能不能用，这取决于所选或安装的语言支持（例如，英语）。

trans-unit.source: The number of pages you want Word to fit horizontally on one page.
trans-unit.target: 希望 Word 在一页上水平布置的页数。

trans-unit.source: Can be 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Use with the <c>PrintZoomRow</c> argument to print multiple pages on a single sheet.
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>PrintZoomRow</c> 参数结合使用，用于在单张纸上打印多页。

trans-unit.source: The number of pages you want Word to fit vertically on one page.
trans-unit.target: 希望 Word 在一页上垂直布置的页数。

trans-unit.source: Can be 1, 2, or 4.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 1、2 或 4。

trans-unit.source: Use with the <c>PrintZoomColumn</c> argument to print multiple pages on a single sheet.
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>PrintZoomColumn</c> 参数结合使用，用于在单张纸上打印多页。

trans-unit.source: The width to which you want Word to scale printed pages, in twips (20 twips = 1 point; 72 points = 1 inch).
trans-unit.target: 希望 Word 将打印页缩放到的宽度（以缇表示，20 缇 = 1 磅，72 磅 = 1 英寸）。

trans-unit.source: The height to which you want Word to scale printed pages, in twips (20 twips = 1 point; 72 points = 1 inch).
trans-unit.target: 希望 Word 将打印页缩放到的高度（以缇表示，20 缇 = 1 磅，72 磅 = 1 英寸）。

trans-unit.source: Prints all or part of the document.
trans-unit.target: 打印文档的一部分或全部。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.PrintOut%2A>方法以打印整个文档的两个副本。

trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether PRINT field instructions (such as PostScript commands) in a document are to be printed on top of text and graphics when a PostScript printer is used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在使用 PostScript 打印机时，文档中的 PRINT 字段说明（如 PostScript 命令）是否打印到文本和图形的顶部。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if PRINT field instructions (such as PostScript commands) in a document are to be printed on top of text and graphics when a PostScript printer is used; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用 PostScript 打印机时，文档中的 PRINT 字段说明（如 PostScript 命令）将打印到文本和图形的顶部，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether postscript code is printed in a converted Microsoft Office Word for Macintosh document.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制是否在转换后的 Microsoft Office Word Macintosh 文档打印 postscript 代码。

trans-unit.source: If the document contains no PRINT fields, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档包含未打印字段，则此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: Switches the view to print preview.
trans-unit.target: 将视图切换到打印预览。

trans-unit.source: In addition to using this method, you can set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PrintPreview%2A> property to `true` or `false` to switch to or from print preview, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用此方法，你可以设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PrintPreview%2A>属性`true`或`false`可以切换到或打印预览中，从分别。

trans-unit.source: You can also change the view by setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View.Type%2A> property for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View> to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdViewType.wdPrintPreview>.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以更改视图，通过设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View.Type%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View>到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdViewType.wdPrintPreview>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether revision marks are printed with the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示修订标记是否随文档一起打印。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if revision marks are printed with the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> (tracked changes are printed as if they had been accepted).
trans-unit.target: 如果修订标记随文档一起打印，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />（修订会打印出来，就好像它们已被接受一样）。

trans-unit.source: The protection type for the specified document.
trans-unit.target: 指定的文档的保护类型。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to reset form fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则将窗体字段重置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to retain the current form field values if the document is protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在文档处于保护状态时，保留当前窗体字段值。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Type</c> is not <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyFormFields" />, the <c>NoReset</c> argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Type</c> 不为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyFormFields" />，则忽略 <c>NoReset</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: The password required to remove protection from the document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除保护时所需的密码。

trans-unit.source: (See Remarks below.)
trans-unit.target: （请参见下面的备注。）

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to use Information Rights Management (IRM) when protecting the document from changes.
trans-unit.target: 指定在防止文档被更改时是否使用信息权限管理 (IRM)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether formatting restrictions are enforced in a protected document.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否在受保护文档中强制格式设置限制。

trans-unit.source: Applies one of several types of protection to the document.
trans-unit.target: 向文档应用几种保护类型中的一种。

trans-unit.source: When a document is protected, users can make only limited changes, such as adding annotations, making revisions, or completing a form.
trans-unit.target: 如果保护文档，则用户可以进行有限的更改，如添加批注、 进行修订，或者完成窗体。

trans-unit.source: If the document is already protected when you use this method, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果已受保护文档，在使用此方法时，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications.
trans-unit.target: 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Protect%2A> method to allow users to add only comments to the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Protect%2A>方法以允许用户添加到文档仅注释。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Provides you with an opportunity to reapply password protection to the document after the cached data has been saved.
trans-unit.target: 提供在缓存数据已保存后对文档重新应用密码保护的机会。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in a document-level project for Word if your document is protected by using a password, and it contains cached data that might be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法在文档级项目中的 Word 文档受密码保护，并且它包含可能在运行时更改的缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: In your implementation of this method, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Protect%2A> method to protect the document .
trans-unit.target: 在你实现此方法中，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Protect%2A>方法保护的文档。

trans-unit.source: By default, changes to cached data in a password-protected document are not persisted when the document is saved.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，对受密码保护的文档中的缓存数据的更改不会保留在保存文档时。

trans-unit.source: To save changes to the cached data, you must override the following methods in your project:
trans-unit.target: 若要将更改保存到缓存的数据，必须在你的项目中重写以下方法：

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When the document is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method.
trans-unit.target: 保存文档后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Add code to this method that temporarily unprotects the document.
trans-unit.target: 将代码添加到此方法的暂时取消保护文档。

trans-unit.source: This enables changes to the cached data to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 这使对缓存的数据要保存更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A>。

trans-unit.source: After the document is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method.
trans-unit.target: 保存文档后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Add code to this method that reapplies protection to the document.
trans-unit.target: 将代码添加到此方法的重新应用到文档的保护。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Cache Data in a Password-Protected Document](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Password-Protected 文档中缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md)。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A> method even if the cached data could not be saved because of some error that is unrelated to the password protection.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A>方法，即使由于无关密码保护某些错误，无法保存缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you implement the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType> interface to customize how cached data is stored in the document, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A> method is called even if your <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType> implementation throws an exception that prevents the cached data from being saved.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你实现<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType>接口可自定义缓存的数据的方式存储在文档中，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A>调用方法即使你<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType>实现引发了异常，防止保存缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A> method to reapply protection that was removed by overriding the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.UnprotectDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A>方法以重新应用已通过重写中删除的保护<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code assumes that the password is stored in a field named `securelyStoredPassword`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码假定该密码存储在名为的字段中`securelyStoredPassword`。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the protection type for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的保护类型。

trans-unit.source: The returned protection type can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyComments" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyFormFields" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyReading" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyRevisions" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdNoProtection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回的保护类型可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyComments" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyFormFields" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyReading" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyRevisions" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdNoProtection" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example checks whether protection has been set for the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查是否已为文档设置保护。

trans-unit.source: If not, the code sets protection to allow only comments.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该代码将设置防护只允许将批注。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ReadabilityStatistics" /> collection that represents the readability statistics for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ReadabilityStatistics" /> 集合，表示文档的可读性统计信息。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当文档在阅读版式视图中显示且被冻结以输入手写标记时，文档中页的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width of pages in the document when it is displayed in reading layout view and is frozen for entering handwritten markup.
trans-unit.target: 当文档在阅读版式视图中显示且被冻结以输入手写标记时，文档中页的宽度。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当文档在阅读版式视图中显示且被冻结以输入手写标记时，文档中页的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of pages in the document when it is displayed in reading layout view and is frozen for entering handwritten markup.
