trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether pages displayed in reading layout view are frozen to a specified size for inserting handwritten markup into a document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示在阅读版式视图中显示的页面是否被冻结到指定的大小以便向文档中插入手写标记。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if pages displayed in reading layout view are frozen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在阅读版式视图中显示的页面被冻结，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ReadingLayoutSizeX%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ReadingLayoutSizeY%2A>属性以指定的页大小显示当正在读取的布局大小被冻结以将手写的标记插入到文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether changes to the document cannot be saved to the original document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示对文档进行的更改是否不能保存到原始文档中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if changes to the document cannot be saved to the original document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对文档进行的更改不能保存到原始文档中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word displays a message whenever a user opens the document, suggesting that the document be opened as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示在用户打开文档时 Microsoft Office Word 是否显示一条消息，指出文档只能以只读方式打开。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Word displays a message box whenever a user opens the document, suggesting that the document be opened as read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在用户打开文档时 Word 显示一个消息框，指出文档只能以只读方式打开，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 要重复的操作的数目。

trans-unit.target: 执行已撤消的上一个操作（与 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Undo(System.Object@)" /> 方法相反）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the actions were redone successfully.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds three words to the document, calls the undo method twice, and then calls the redo method once.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例向文档添加三个单词，两次，调用撤消方法，然后一次调用重做方法。

trans-unit.source: Two words are left in the document.
trans-unit.target: 两个字保留在文档中。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Rejects all tracked changes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 拒绝文档中的所有修订。

trans-unit.source: Rejects all revisions in the document that are displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 拒绝文档中所有显示在屏幕上的修订。

trans-unit.source: Reloads a cached document by resolving the hyperlink to the document and downloading the document.
trans-unit.target: 通过解析缓存文档的超链接并下载该文档来重新加载它。

trans-unit.source: This method reloads the document asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以异步方式重新加载文档。

trans-unit.source: Statements following the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Reload%2A> method in your procedure might execute before the document is actually reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 语句以下<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Reload%2A>文档实际重新加载之前可能执行了在过程中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you might get unexpected results from using this method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你可能从使用此方法获取意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Reloads a document based on an HTML document, using the specified document encoding.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文档编码，重新加载基于 HTML 文档的文档。

trans-unit.source: The following code example reloads the document and automatically detects the encoding to use.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将重新加载文档，并自动检测要使用的编码。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project..
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`类在文档级项目中...

trans-unit.source: Removes the customization from the document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档移除自定义。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the customization by performing the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以通过执行以下任务来删除自定义项：

trans-unit.source: It deletes the `_AssemblyName` and `_AssemblyLocation` custom properties from the document.
trans-unit.target: 它将删除`_AssemblyName`和`_AssemblyLocation`从文档的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Document Properties Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义文档属性概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: It deletes the cached data from the document.
trans-unit.target: 它从文档中删除缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cached data, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关缓存数据的详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method might throw an <xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException> if the document is protected.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能引发<xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException>如果受保护文档。

trans-unit.source: You should remove any protection from the document before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 应调用此方法之前从文档中删除任何保护。

trans-unit.source: The custom document properties or the cached data could not be removed from the document.
trans-unit.target: 无法从文档移除自定义文档属性或缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: The document is protected.
trans-unit.target: 文档是受保护的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a document stores the date and time metadata for tracked changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示文档是否存储修订的日期和时间元数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document removes date and time stamp information from tracked changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档从修订中移除日期和时间戳信息，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use in conjunction with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RemovePersonalInformation%2A> property to help remove personal information from the document properties.
trans-unit.target: 结合使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RemovePersonalInformation%2A>属性，以帮助从文档属性中删除个人信息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdRemoveDocInfoType" /> values that specifies what information to remove.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdRemoveDocInfoType" /> 值之一，指定要移除的信息。

trans-unit.source: Removes metadata, such as properties and comments, from a document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除元数据（如属性和注释）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes all the document properties of the current document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中移除当前文档的所有文档属性。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Purges a document of locked styles when formatting restrictions have been applied in a document.
trans-unit.target: 在向文档应用了格式设置限制时清除锁定样式的文档。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of number to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的编号的类型。

trans-unit.source: Removes numbers or bullets from the document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除编号或项目符号。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RemoveNumbers%2A> method to remove LISTNUM fields from the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RemoveNumbers%2A>方法移除 LISTNUM 字段从文档。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word removes all user information from comments, revisions, and the **Properties** dialog box when the user saves the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示在用户保存文档时，Microsoft Office Word 是否从注释、修订和“属性”对话框中移除所有用户信息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word removes all user information from comments, revisions, and the **Properties** dialog box when the document is saved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果注释，修订，从 Microsoft Office Word 中删除的所有用户信息和**属性**对话框中的文档时保存; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the active theme from the document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除活动主题。

trans-unit.source: Repaginates the entire document.
trans-unit.target: 重标整个文档的页码。

trans-unit.source: Opens a new e-mail message for replying to the active message.
trans-unit.target: 打开新电子邮件以答复活动消息。

trans-unit.source: The sender's address is included on the To: line.
trans-unit.target: 发件人的地址包含在“到:”行中。

trans-unit.source: Opens a new e-mail message for replying to the active message.
trans-unit.target: 打开新电子邮件以答复活动消息。

trans-unit.source: The sender’s address and all other recipients' addresses are included on the To: and Cc: lines as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 发件人的地址和所有其他收件人的地址根据相应的情况包含在“到:”和“抄送:”行中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the message prior to sending.
trans-unit.target: 如果在发送之前显示消息，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to automatically send the message without displaying it first.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则自动发送消息，而不首先显示消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends an e-mail message to the author of a document that has been sent out for review, notifying him or her that a reviewer has completed review of the document.
trans-unit.target: 将电子邮件发送给已发出进行审阅的文档的作者，向作者通知审阅者已完成对该文档的审阅。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendForReview%2A> method to start a collaborative review of a document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendForReview%2A>方法以启动文档协作审阅。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ReplyWithChanges%2A> method is executed on a document that is not part of a collaborative review cycle, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ReplyWithChanges%2A>方法执行不协作审阅循环的一部分的文档，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ReplyWithChanges%2A> method to notify the author that the document has been reviewed, without displaying the message to the sender first.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ReplyWithChanges%2A>方法以通知作者，查看文档，而不先显示对发送方的消息。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document is part of a collaborative review cycle.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档是协作审阅循环的一部分。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个标识 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility" /> 接口的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that implements the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> interface in a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 返回在文档级自定义项中实现 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object in your document-level customization that implements the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 文档级自定义项中实现 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you are customizing the Ribbon of the document by creating your own implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility?displayProperty=fullName> interface or by adding a **Ribbon (XML)** item to your project.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过自定义文档的功能区创建您自己的实现重写此方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility?displayProperty=fullName>接口或通过添加**功能区 (XML)**到你的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: If you customize the Ribbon by adding a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to your project, Visual Studio overrides this method for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过添加自定义功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到你的项目，Visual Studio 重写此方法为你。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md) and [Ribbon Designer](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)和[功能区设计器](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, check the value of the `serviceGuid` parameter to determine whether the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface is being requested, and then return an object that implements the interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写此方法，请检查的值`serviceGuid`参数，以确定是否`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口正在请求、，然后返回实现该接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: When your document is opened, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RequestService%2A>, and it sends the return value to Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 当打开文档时，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RequestService%2A>，然后它将返回的值发送到 Microsoft Office Word。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface, see [IRibbonExtensibility Object](HV10096517) in the Microsoft Office documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口，请参阅[IRibbonExtensibility 对象](HV10096517)Microsoft Office 文档中。

trans-unit.source: You can alternatively override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A> method instead of overriding the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RequestService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者可以重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A>方法而非重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RequestService%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md)。

trans-unit.source: `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` is one of several interfaces (also named *extensibility interfaces*) that are provided by Microsoft Office.
trans-unit.target: `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` 是多个接口 (也名为*扩展性接口*) 提供的 Microsoft Office。

trans-unit.source: However, this is the only interface that you can implement in a document-level customization for Word.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这是可以在 Word 文档级自定义项中实现的唯一接口。

trans-unit.source: You can implement other extensibility interfaces in application-level add-ins. For more information, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md).
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序级外接程序，可以实现其他扩展性接口。有关详细信息，请参阅[UI 功能通过使用扩展性接口自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the research service for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的信息检索服务。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Research" /> object that represents the research service for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Research" /> 对象，表示文档的信息检索服务。

trans-unit.source: The following code example accesses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Research> object of the document to set the default language pair that is used in the translation service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例访问<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Research>文档设置为使用的默认语言对翻译服务中的对象。

trans-unit.source: It sets English (US) as the language of the source text to translate from and Japanese as the language to translate the text to.
trans-unit.target: 它将英语 （美国） 设置为要将转换的源文本和为语言的日语转换到的文本的语言。

trans-unit.source: The default translation languages appear in the **Research** pane in Word under the **Translation** section.
trans-unit.target: 默认的翻译语言显示在**研究**在 Word 中的窗格**转换**部分。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Clears all form fields in a document, preparing the form to be filled in again.
trans-unit.target: 清除文档中的所有窗体字段，并准备再次填写窗体。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to clear fields when a document's fields are not locked.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法以在文档的字段不处于锁定状态时清除字段。

trans-unit.source: To clear fields when a document's fields are locked, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Protect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在文档字段处于锁定状态时，请清除字段，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Protect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the title of the revised document after performing a legal-blackline document compare operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取执行显示更改的文档比较操作后的修订文档的标题。

trans-unit.source: The title of the revised document after performing a legal-blackline document compare operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行显示更改的文档比较操作后的修订文档的标题。

trans-unit.source: To perform a legal-blackline document compare operation, use the `CompareDocuments` method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Application%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行精确比较文档的比较操作，使用`CompareDocuments`方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Application%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example compares the Word document in the document-level customization (called the original document) with another version of the same document (called the revised document).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将在文档级自定义项 （称为原始文档） 与同一文档 （称为修订过的文档） 的另一个版本的 Word 文档进行比较。

trans-unit.source: It places the result of the comparison into the original document.
trans-unit.target: 它将比较的结果放到原始文档中。

trans-unit.source: The example then notifies the user whether the title of the original document and the title of the revised document are identical or different and displays both document titles.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后通知用户，无论原始文档的标题和修改后的文档的标题是相同还是不同，显示这两个文档标题。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Revisions" /> collection that represents the tracked changes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Revisions" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的修订。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Revisions" /> collection that represents the tracked changes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Revisions" /> 集合，表示文档中的修订。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoMacros" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoMacros" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Runs an auto macro that is stored in the document.
trans-unit.target: 运行存储在文档中的自动宏。

trans-unit.source: If the specified auto macro does not exist, nothing happens.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的自动宏不存在，不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RunAutoMacro%2A> method to run the `AutoOpen` auto macro.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RunAutoMacro%2A>方法以运行`AutoOpen`自动宏。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the `AutoOpen` macro has been added to the document.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定`AutoOpen`宏已添加到文档。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" />。

trans-unit.source: Any filled properties in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" /> show up as filled elements in the **Letter Wizard** dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" /> 中所有已填充的属性都显示为“英文信函向导”对话框中的已填充元素。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.GetLetterContent" /> method is automatically used to get a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" /> from the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则自动使用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.GetLetterContent" /> 方法从文档获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the **Letter Wizard** dialog box as a series of steps with **Next**, **Back**, and **Finish** buttons.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将“英文信函向导”对话框显示为带有“下一步”、“上一步”和“完成”按钮的一系列步骤。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to display the **Letter Wizard** dialog box as if it were opened from the **Tools** menu (a properties dialog box with an **OK** button and a **Cancel** button).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则按照“英文信函向导”对话框从“工具”菜单中打开的方式来显示该对话框，即显示为一个带有“确定”和“取消”按钮的属性对话框。

trans-unit.source: The default value is true.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 true。

trans-unit.source: Runs the **Letter Wizard** on the document.
trans-unit.target: 在文档中运行“英文信函向导”。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.CreateLetterContent%2A> method to return a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent> with various letter element properties specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.CreateLetterContent%2A>方法以返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent>的各种字母元素属性指定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.GetLetterContent%2A> method to return a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent> based on the contents of the document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.GetLetterContent%2A>方法以返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent>基于文档的内容。

trans-unit.source: You can use the resulting <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent> with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RunLetterWizard%2A> method to set elements in the **Letter Wizard** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用生成<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent>与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RunLetterWizard%2A>方法以设置的元素**字母向导**对话框。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent> by calling the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.CreateLetterContent%2A> method, and then sends this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent> as a parameter to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RunLetterWizard%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent>通过调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.CreateLetterContent%2A>方法，然后将发送此<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent>作为参数传递给<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.RunLetterWizard%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Saves the document.
trans-unit.target: 保存文档。

trans-unit.source: If the document has not been saved before, the **Save As** dialog box prompts the user for a file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档在以前没有保存过，“另存为”对话框会提示用户输入一个文件名。

trans-unit.source: The name for the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current folder and file name.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是当前文件夹名和文件名。

trans-unit.source: If the document has never been saved, the default name is used (for example, Doc1.doc).
trans-unit.target: 如果文档在以前没有保存过，则使用默认名称（例如，Doc1.doc）。

trans-unit.source: If a document with the specified file name already exists, the document is overwritten without the user being prompted first.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经存在具有指定文件名的文档，则会在不先提示用户的情况下覆盖文档。

trans-unit.source: The format in which the document is saved.
trans-unit.target: 文档的保存格式。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: To save a document in another format, specify the appropriate value for the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SaveFormat" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要以另一种格式保存文档，请为 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SaveFormat" /> 属性指定适当的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to lock the document for comments.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则锁定文档以进行注释。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A password string for opening the document.
trans-unit.target: 用来打开文档的密码字符串。

trans-unit.source: (See Remarks below.)
trans-unit.target: （请参见下面的备注。）

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add the document to the list of recently used files on the **File** menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将该文档添加到“文件”菜单上最近使用的文件列表中。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A password string for saving changes to the document.
trans-unit.target: 用来保存对文件所做更改的密码字符串。

trans-unit.source: (See Remarks below.)
trans-unit.target: （请参见下面的备注。）

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Word suggest read-only status whenever the document is opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则让 Microsoft Office Word 在打开文档时建议只读状态。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to save TrueType fonts with the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将 TrueType 字体随文档一起保存。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, the <c>EmbedTrueTypeFonts</c> argument assumes the value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.EmbedTrueTypeFonts" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则 <c>EmbedTrueTypeFonts</c> 参数假定 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.EmbedTrueTypeFonts" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If graphics were imported from another platform (for example, Macintosh), <see langword="true" /> to save only the Windows version of the imported graphics.
trans-unit.target: 如果图形是从另一个平台（例如，Macintosh）导入的，则 <see langword="true" /> 表示仅保存导入图形的 Windows 版本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to save the data entered by a user in a form as a data record.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将用户在窗体中输入的数据另存为数据记录。

trans-unit.source: If the document has an attached mailer, <see langword="true" /> to save the document as an AOCE letter (the mailer is saved).
trans-unit.target: 如果文档附加了邮件程序，则 <see langword="true" /> 表示会将文档另存为 AOCE 信函（邮件程序会进行保存）。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" />。

trans-unit.source: The code page, or character set, to use for documents saved as encoded text files.
trans-unit.target: 要用于另存为编码文本文件的文档的代码页或字符集。

trans-unit.source: The default is the system code page.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是系统代码页。

trans-unit.source: If the document is saved as a text file, <see langword="true" /> to insert line breaks at the end of each line of text.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档另存为文本文件，则 <see langword="true" /> 表示在每行文本末尾插入分行符。

trans-unit.source: If the document is saved as a text file, <see langword="true" /> allows Word to replace some symbols with text that looks similar.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档另存为文本文件，则 <see langword="true" /> 允许 Word 将某些符号替换为外观与之类似的文本。

trans-unit.source: For example, displaying the copyright symbol as (c).
trans-unit.target: 例如，将版权符号显示为 (c)。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The way Word marks the line and paragraph breaks in documents saved as text files.
trans-unit.target: Word 在另存为文本文件的文档中标记分行符和换段符。

trans-unit.source: Can be any T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineEndingType value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineEndingType 值。

trans-unit.source: true adds control characters to the output file to preserve bi-directional layout of the text in the original document.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true，则向输出文件添加控制字符，以便保留原始文档中文本的双向布局。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompatibilityMode" /> values that specifies the compatibility mode that [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] uses when opening the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompatibilityMode" /> 值，指定在打开文档时 [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 使用的兼容性模式。

trans-unit.source: Saves the document with a new name or format.
trans-unit.target: 用新名称或新格式保存文档。

trans-unit.source: Some of the arguments for this method correspond to the options in the **Save As** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的某些参数与“另存为”对话框中的选项相对应。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications.
trans-unit.target: 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SaveAs%2A> method to save the document in RTF format using the new file name myfile.docx.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SaveAs%2A>方法以使用新的文件名称 myfile.docx RTF 格式保存文档。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in a Word 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The full path of the quick style set file.
trans-unit.target: 快速样式集文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Saves the group of quick styles currently in use.
trans-unit.target: 保存当前使用的快速样式组。

trans-unit.source: The following code example saves the current set of quick styles to a .dotx file and causes Microsoft Office Word to display the new quick style set in the **Style Set** list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将当前的快速样式集保存到.dotx 文件，并会导致 Microsoft Office Word 设置了新快速样式显示**设置样式，则**列表。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the document has not changed since it was last saved.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示文档自上次保存以来是否未进行过更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document has not changed since it was last saved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档自上次保存以来未进行过更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: (If <see langword="false" />, Microsoft Office Word displays a prompt to save changes when the document is closed.)
trans-unit.target: （如果为 <see langword="false" />，Microsoft Office Word 将在文档关闭时显示一个保存更改的提示。）

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding to use when saving the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在保存文档时使用的编码。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies Western encoding for saving the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例指定用于保存文档西方编码。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file format of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: The file format of the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a unique number that specifies an external file converter or a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat> constant.
trans-unit.target: 值是唯一的编号，指定外部文件转换器或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat>常量。

trans-unit.source: Use the value of this property for the `FileFormat` argument of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SaveAs%2A> method to save a document in a file format for which there is not a corresponding <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat> constant.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性的值`FileFormat`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SaveAs%2A>方法以将文档保存为其存在是不对应的文件格式<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat>常量。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SaveAs%2A> method to save the document to the new file name myfile.docx in RTF format.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SaveAs%2A>方法将文档保存到新的文件名称 myfile.docx RTF 格式。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word saves the data entered in a form as a tab-delimited record for use in a database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否将在窗体中输入的数据保存为 tab 分隔的记录以在数据库中使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word saves the data entered in a form as a tab-delimited record for use in a database; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 将在窗体中输入的数据保存为 tab 分隔的记录以在数据库中使用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word saves a subset of the embedded TrueType fonts with the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否将嵌入的 TrueType 字体的子集随文档一起保存。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word saves a subset of the embedded TrueType fonts with the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 将嵌入的 TrueType 字体的子集随文档一起保存，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If fewer than 32 characters of a TrueType font are used in a document, Word embeds the subset (only the characters used) in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果在文档中使用的 TrueType 字体少于 32 个字符，Word 将文档中嵌入的子集 （仅使用的字符）。

trans-unit.source: If more than 32 characters are used, Word embeds the entire font.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了 32 个以上字符，Word 会嵌入整个字体。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Scripts" /> collection that represents the collection of HTML scripts in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Scripts" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中 HTML 脚本的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Scripts" /> collection that represents the collection of HTML scripts in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Scripts" /> 集合，表示文档中 HTML 脚本的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sections" /> collection that represents the sections in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sections" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的节。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sections" /> collection that represents the sections in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sections" /> 集合，表示文档中的节。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds text to the first paragraph in the document and then adds a new section before the text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将文本添加到文档中的第一个段落，然后添加新的文本之前的部分。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Selects the document.
trans-unit.target: 选择文档。

trans-unit.source: After using this method, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.Selection%2A> property to work with the document.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法后，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.Selection%2A>属性以使用该文档。

trans-unit.source: Can be the user's e-mail alias (if in the same domain), an e-mail address, or a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEditorType" /> constant that represents a group of users.
trans-unit.target: 可以是用户的电子邮件别名（如果在同一个域中）、电子邮件地址或表示用户组的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEditorType" /> 常数。

trans-unit.source: The default is that only ranges for which all users have permissions are selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认设置是仅选择所有用户对其拥有权限的范围。

trans-unit.source: Selects all ranges that the specified user or group of users has permission to modify.
trans-unit.target: 选择指定的用户或用户组对其拥有修改权限的全部范围。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SelectAllEditableRanges%2A> method to select all ranges that the current user has the right to modify.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SelectAllEditableRanges%2A>方法来选择当前用户有权修改的所有范围。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: The tag of the content controls to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的内容控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the content controls in the document that have the specified tag.
trans-unit.target: 返回文档中具有指定标记的所有内容控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> collection that contains the content controls that have the specified tag.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> 集合，包含文档中具有指定标记的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds three paragraphs to the document and then adds one control to each new paragraph: a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.RichTextContentControl>, a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>, and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DropDownListContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将三个段落添加到文档，然后将控件添加到每个新段落： <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.RichTextContentControl>、 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>，和一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DropDownListContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the Tag and Title properties of each control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置每个控件的标记和标题属性。

trans-unit.source: Next, the code calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SelectContentControlsByTag%2A> method to get the collection of native content controls whose tag value equals **Customer** and then displays the title of each control from the returned collection in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，该代码调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SelectContentControlsByTag%2A>方法以获取的本机内容控件的集合的标记值等于**客户**，然后在消息框中显示每个控件的标题从返回的集合。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: The title of the content controls to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的内容控件的标题。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the content controls in the document that have the specified title.
trans-unit.target: 返回文档中具有指定标题的所有内容控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> collection that contains the content controls that have the specified title.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> 集合，包含文档中具有指定标题的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds two paragraphs to the document and then adds one control to each new paragraph: a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.RichTextContentControl>, and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将两个段落添加到文档，然后将控件添加到每个新段落： <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.RichTextContentControl>，和一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the Tag and Title properties of each control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置每个控件的标记和标题属性。

trans-unit.source: Next, the code calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SelectContentControlsByTitle%2A> method to get the collection of native content controls whose title equals **Customer Title**.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，该代码调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SelectContentControlsByTitle%2A>方法以获取其标题的本机内容控件的集合等于**客户标题**。

trans-unit.source: It then modifies the placeholder text of each control in the returned collection, which in this case contains only the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 然后修改中返回的集合，在这种情况下仅包含每个控件的占位符文本<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selection changes in the document window.
trans-unit.target: 在文档窗口中的选定内容发生更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message that indicates that the selection has changed whenever you change the selection within the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一条消息，指示所选内容已更改，每当你更改所选内容的文档中。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLNode" /> to which the content controls are linked.
trans-unit.target: 内容控件链接到的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLNode" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the content controls in the document that are linked to the specified custom XML node.
trans-unit.target: 返回文档中链接到指定自定义 XML 节点的所有内容控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> collection that contains the content controls that are linked to the specified custom XML node.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> 集合，包含链接到指定自定义 XML 节点的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds three plain text content controls to the current document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将三个纯文本内容控件添加到当前文档。

trans-unit.source: The example also adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart> that contains employee data and links two of the content controls to XML nodes in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart>，其中包含员工数据，链接两个内容控件中的 XML 节点到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart>。

trans-unit.source: Next, the code gets the controls that are linked to the employee name node, displays a message box that shows the number of linked controls found, and finally iterates through the linked controls to display the title of each linked control.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，代码会获取链接到员工名称节点，显示一个消息框来显示找到的链接控件的数目和最后循环访问链接控件以显示每个链接控件的标题的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you run this code, you should get one linked control and its title should be **Employee Name**.
trans-unit.target: 如果运行此代码，则应获得一个链接的控件并且其标题应**雇员姓名**。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: A valid XPath string.
trans-unit.target: 有效的 XPath 字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information on XPath, see XPath Reference.
trans-unit.target: 关于 XPath 的更多信息，请参见 XPath 参考。

trans-unit.source: Provides the prefix in the schema against which to perform the search.
trans-unit.target: 提供架构中用作搜索依据的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <c>PrefixMapping</c> parameter if your <c>XPath</c> parameter uses names to search for elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>XPath</c> 参数使用名称搜索元素，请使用 <c>PrefixMapping</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> skips all text nodes while searching for the specified node.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在搜索指定的节点时忽略所有文本节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> includes text nodes in the search.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则在搜索中包含文本节点。

trans-unit.source: Default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents all the nodes that match the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter in the order in which they appear in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，该集合表示按照节点在文档中出现的顺序与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents all the nodes that match the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter in the order in which they appear in the document; <see langword="null" /> if no nodes matching the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter are found.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，该集合表示按照节点在文档中出现的顺序与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的所有节点；如果未找到与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的节点，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `FastSearchSkippingTextNodes` parameter to `true` diminishes performance, because Microsoft Office Word searches all nodes in a document against the text contained in the node.
trans-unit.target: 设置`FastSearchSkippingTextNodes`参数`true`会降低性能，因为 Microsoft Office Word 搜索对节点中包含的文本文档中的所有节点。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify the `XPath` and `PrefixMapping` parameters when calling the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SelectNodes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定`XPath`和`PrefixMapping`参数调用时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SelectNodes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: A valid XPath string.
trans-unit.target: 有效的 XPath 字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about XPath, see XPath Reference.
trans-unit.target: 关于 XPath 的更多信息，请参见 XPath 参考。

trans-unit.source: Provides the prefix in the schema against which to perform the search.
trans-unit.target: 提供架构中用作搜索依据的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <c>PrefixMapping</c> parameter if your <c>XPath</c> parameter uses names to search for elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>XPath</c> 参数使用名称搜索元素，请使用 <c>PrefixMapping</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> skips all text nodes while searching for the specified node.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在搜索指定的节点时忽略所有文本节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> includes text nodes in the search.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则在搜索中包含文本节点。

trans-unit.source: Default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 false。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> object that represents the first node in the document that matches the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象，该对象表示文档中与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的第一个节点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> object that represents the first node that matches the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter in the document; <see langword="null" /> if no nodes matching the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter are found.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象，该对象表示文档中与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的第一个节点；如果未找到与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的节点，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `FastSearchSkippingTextNodes` parameter to `true` diminishes performance because Microsoft Office Word searches all nodes in a document against the text contained in the node.
trans-unit.target: 设置`FastSearchSkippingTextNodes`参数`true`会降低性能，因为 Microsoft Office Word 搜索对节点中包含的文本文档中的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify the `XPath` and `PrefixMapping` parameters when calling the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SelectSingleNode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定`XPath`和`PrefixMapping`参数调用时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SelectSingleNode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart" /> that is used to filter the content controls you want to get in the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart" /> 用于筛选想要从文档中获取的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a value for this parameter, this method returns only the content controls that referencethis<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart" /> in their <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControl.XMLMapping" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果为参数指定值，则此方法只返回在其 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControl.XMLMapping" /> 属性中引用此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart" /> 的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the content controls in the document that are not linked to a custom XML part.
trans-unit.target: 返回文档中所有内容控件（未链接到自定义 XML 部件）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> collection that contains the content controls in the document that are not linked to a custom XML part.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> 集合，它包含文档中的内容控件（未链接到自定义 XML 部件）。

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The recipient's fax number.
trans-unit.target: 收件人的传真号。

trans-unit.source: The text for the subject line.
trans-unit.target: 主题行的文本。

trans-unit.source: The character limit is 255.
trans-unit.target: 字符限制是 255。

trans-unit.source: Sends the document as a fax, without any user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 以传真形式发送文档，无需用户交互。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendFax%2A> method to fax the document to a fax number and with a subject line.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendFax%2A>方法向传真的文档向传真号码以及主题行。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: The fax numbers and e-mail addresses of the people to whom to send the fax.
trans-unit.target: 传真接收人员的传真号和电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Separate multiple recipients with a semicolon.
trans-unit.target: 用分号分隔多个收件人。

trans-unit.source: The subject line for the faxed document.
trans-unit.target: 传真文档的主题行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the fax message before sending it.
trans-unit.target: 如果在发送之前显示传真邮件，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to send the fax without displaying the fax message.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则发送传真邮件时不显示该邮件。

trans-unit.source: Sends the document to a fax service provider, who faxes the document to one or more specified recipients.
trans-unit.target: 将文档发送给传真服务提供程序，该提供程序会将文档传真给指定的一个或多个收件人。

trans-unit.source: Using this method requires that a fax service is enabled on a user's computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法需要用户的计算机上启用了传真服务。

trans-unit.source: If a fax service is not enabled, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendFaxOverInternet%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果传真服务未启用，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendFaxOverInternet%2A>方法引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The format used for specifying fax numbers in the `Recipients` parameter is either *recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider* or *recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber*.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定中的传真号码的格式`Recipients`参数可以是* recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider *或* recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber *。

trans-unit.source: You can access the user's fax provider information using the following registry path:
trans-unit.target: 您可以访问用户的传真提供程序信息使用以下注册表路径：

trans-unit.source: Use the `FaxAddress` key value at this registry location to determine the format to use for a user.
trans-unit.target: 使用`FaxAddress`键值在此注册表位置来确定要使用用户的格式。

trans-unit.source: If this registry entry does not exist, no fax service is available.
trans-unit.target: 如果此注册表项不存在，则传真服务不可用。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendFaxOverInternet%2A> method to fax the document to a fax number using the format *recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider*.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendFaxOverInternet%2A>方法将传真发送到使用格式的传真号码的文档* recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider *。

trans-unit.source: The code displays the document before sending the fax.
trans-unit.target: 代码将显示在发送传真之前的文档。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: The people to whom to send the message.
trans-unit.target: 邮件收件人。

trans-unit.source: These can be unresolved names and aliases in an e-mail phone book or full e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: 这些收件人可以是电子邮件电话簿中未解析的名称和别名，或完整的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Separate multiple recipients with a semicolon (;).
trans-unit.target: 用分号 (;) 分隔多个收件人。

trans-unit.source: If left blank and <c>ShowMessage</c> is <see langword="false" />, an exception is thrown and the message is not sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果留为空白，而且 <c>ShowMessage</c> 为 <see langword="false" />，则引发异常，因而不发送消息。

trans-unit.source: The subject of the message.
trans-unit.target: 邮件的主题。

trans-unit.source: If left blank, the subject will be: Please review "<c>filename</c>".
trans-unit.target: 如果留为空白，则主题将为：请查看“<c>filename</c>”。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the message before sending; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在发送之前显示消息，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If set to <see langword="false" />, the message is automatically sent to the recipients without first showing the message to the sender.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 <see langword="false" />，则邮件会自动发送给收件人，而不首先向发件人显示邮件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the document as an attachment; <see langword="false" /> to send a link to the document at a server location.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将文档包括为附件；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则发送指向服务器位置上的文档的链接。

trans-unit.source: If set to <see langword="false" />, the document must be stored at a shared location.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 <see langword="false" />，则必须将文档存储在共享位置。

trans-unit.source: Sends the document in an e-mail message for review by the specified recipients.
trans-unit.target: 以电子邮件形式发送文档，以便供指定的收件人审阅。

trans-unit.source: This method starts a collaborative review cycle.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会启动协作审阅周期。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.EndReview%2A> method to end a review cycle.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.EndReview%2A>方法来结束审阅循环。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendForReview%2A> method to send the document to a full e-mail address as an attachment.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SendForReview%2A>方法来为完整的电子邮件地址作为附件发送文档。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Opens a message window for sending the document through Microsoft Exchange.
trans-unit.target: 打开一个消息窗口，以便通过 Microsoft Exchange 发送文档。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.SendMailAttach%2A> property to control whether the document is sent as text in the message window or as an attachment.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.SendMailAttach%2A>属性控制是否将为电子邮件窗口中的文本或作为附件发送文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sentences" /> collection that represents all the sentences in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sentences" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有句子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sentences" /> collection that represents all the sentences in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sentences" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有句子。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds two sentences to the document, and then displays a message that shows the number of sentences in the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例向文档中，添加两个句子，然后显示一条消息，在文档中显示的句子数。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the policy that is specified for the document, when the document is stored on a server that is running Microsoft Office SharePoint Server.
trans-unit.target: 获取为存储在运行 Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 的服务器上的文档指定的策略。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.ServerPolicy" /> object that represents the policy that is specified for the document, when the document is stored on a server that is running Microsoft Office SharePoint Server.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.ServerPolicy" /> 对象，表示为存储在运行 Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 的服务器上的文档指定的策略。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the information management policy that is associated with the current document and displays the policy name, description, and statement.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检索与当前文档相关联，并显示策略名称、 说明和语句的信息管理策略。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, you must publish the document to a Microsoft Office SharePoint Server site and define an information management policy in the site.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，必须将文档发布到 Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 站点，并在站点定义信息管理策略。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompatibilityMode" /> values that specifies the compatibility mode that [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] uses when opening the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompatibilityMode" /> 值，指定在打开文档时 [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 使用的兼容性模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the compatibility mode for the document.
trans-unit.target: 设置文档的兼容性模式。

trans-unit.source: When you open a document in [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] that was created in a previous version of Word, Compatibility Mode is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 中打开使用早期版本的 Word 创建的文档时，兼容性模式将打开。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility Mode ensures that no new or enhanced features in [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] are available while working with a document, so that people who edit the document using previous versions of Word will have full editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 兼容性模式可确保在处理文档时，[!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 中没有新增或增强功能可用，以便使用早期版本的 Word 编辑文档的用户获得完全编辑功能。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.

trans-unit.source: The name of the style.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the table style to use for newly created tables in the document.
trans-unit.target: 指定要用于文档中新创建的表的表样式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the encryption provider.
trans-unit.target: 加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 加密算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Word supports stream-encrypted algorithms.
trans-unit.target: Word 支持流加密算法。

trans-unit.source: The encryption key length.
trans-unit.target: 加密密钥的长度。

trans-unit.source: Must be a multiple of 8, starting at 40.
trans-unit.target: 必须是 8 的倍数，从 40 开始。

trans-unit.source: true for Word to encrypt file properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true，Word 将加密文件属性。

trans-unit.source: Default is true.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 true。

trans-unit.source: Sets the options Microsoft Office Word uses for encrypting documents with passwords.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Microsoft Office Word 在用密码对文档加密时使用的选项。

trans-unit.source: For enhanced security, do not use Weak Encryption (XOR) (also called "OfficeXor") or "Office97/2000 Compatible" (also called "OfficeStandard") algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 为了增强安全性，不要使用弱加密 (XOR) （也称为"OfficeXor"） 或"Office97/2000年兼容"（也称为"OfficeStandard"） 的算法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to use the RC4 encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法来使用 RC4 加密算法。

trans-unit.source: The code specifies a key length of 56, enables file property encryption, and sets the name of the encryption provider to the string `"Microsoft RSA SChannel Cryptographic Provider"`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码指定密钥长度为 56、 启用文件属性加密，并将加密提供程序的名称设置为字符串`"Microsoft RSA SChannel Cryptographic Provider"`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shapes" /> collection that represents all the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> objects in the document.s
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shapes" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shapes" /> collection that represents all the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> objects in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shapes" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This collection can contain drawings, shapes, pictures, OLE objects, ActiveX controls, text objects, and callouts.
trans-unit.target: 此集合可以包含绘图、 形状、 图片、 OLE 对象、 ActiveX 控件、 文本对象和标注。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Shapes%2A> property, when applied to a document, returns all the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape> objects in the main story of the document, excluding the headers and footers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Shapes%2A>属性，当应用于一个文档，返回所有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape>文档，不包括页眉和页脚的正文中的对象。

trans-unit.source: When applied to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.HeaderFooter> object, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Shapes%2A> property returns all the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape> objects found in all the headers and footers in the document.
trans-unit.target: 当应用于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.HeaderFooter>对象，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Shapes%2A>属性返回所有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape>所有标头和文档的页脚中找到对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether grammatical errors are marked by a wavy green line in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否在文档中用绿色波浪线标记语法错误。

trans-unit.target: 如果在文档中用绿色波浪线标记语法错误，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To view grammatical errors in your document, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.CheckGrammarAsYouType%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看你的文档中的语法错误，必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.CheckGrammarAsYouType%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether tracked changes in the document are shown on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否在屏幕上显示文档中的修订。

trans-unit.target: 如果在屏幕上显示文档中的修订，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word underlines spelling errors in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否用下划线标出文档中的拼写错误。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word underlines spelling errors in the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 用下划线标出文档中的拼写错误，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To view spelling errors in a document, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.CheckSpellingAsYouType%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看在文档中的拼写错误，必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.CheckSpellingAsYouType%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the document host item shuts down.

trans-unit.source: This is the last event that is raised when the document host item in your project unloads.
trans-unit.target: 这是你的项目中的文档主机项卸载时引发的最后一个事件。

trans-unit.source: Use this event for any additional clean up.
trans-unit.target: 此事件用于任何其他清理过程。

trans-unit.source: The application domain for the assembly unloads when the document host item shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 当文档主机项关闭时，将卸载程序集的应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.SignatureSet" /> that represents the digital signatures for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示文档数字签名的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.SignatureSet" />。

trans-unit.source: To digitally sign Microsoft Office Word documents and verify other signatures in them, you need the Microsoft CryptoAPI and a unique digital signature certificate.
trans-unit.target: 若要进行数字签名 Microsoft Office Word 文档和验证其他中它们的签名，你需要 Microsoft CryptoAPI 和唯一的数字签名证书。

trans-unit.source: The CryptoAPI is installed with Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 and higher.
trans-unit.target: CryptoAPI 是使用 Microsoft Internet 资源管理器 4.01 安装和更高版本。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a digital signature certificate from a certification authority.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从证书颁发机构获取数字签名证书。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether AutoShapes or East Asian characters are automatically aligned with an invisible grid when they are drawn, moved, or resized in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示在对文档中的自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动或大小调整时，是否让它们与不可见网格自动对齐。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if AutoShapes or East Asian characters are automatically aligned with an invisible grid when they are drawn, moved, or resized in the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在对文档中的自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动或大小调整时，让它们与不可见网格自动对齐，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can temporarily override this setting by pressing ALT while drawing, moving, or resizing an AutoShape.
trans-unit.target: 你可以绘制、 移动或重设大小自选，按下 ALT 暂时重写此设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word automatically aligns AutoShapes or East Asian characters with invisible gridlines that go through the vertical and horizontal edges of other AutoShapes or East Asian characters in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否将自选图形或东亚字符自动与通过文档中其他自选图形或东亚字符的垂直和水平边缘的不可见网格线对齐。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word automatically aligns AutoShapes or East Asian characters; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 自动对齐自选图形或东亚字符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property creates additional invisible gridlines for each AutoShape.
trans-unit.target: 此属性为每个自选图形创建其他不可见的网格线。

trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SnapToShapes%2A> 独立于适用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SnapToGrid%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether spelling has been checked throughout the document.

trans-unit.target: 若要重新检查文档中的拼写，设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.SpellingChecked%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the local copy of a document that is part of a Document Workspace is synchronized with the copy on the server.

trans-unit.source: A object that contains data you want to save with the document.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the code page, or character set, that Microsoft Office Word uses for a document saved as an encoded text file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Microsoft Office Word 在另存为编码文本文件的文档中使用的代码页或字符集。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This property sets text encoding separately from HTML encoding, which you can set using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions.Encoding%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置文本编码单独从 HTML 编码，可以使用设置此<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions.Encoding%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can get the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions> object from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.WebOptions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions>对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.WebOptions%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To set text encoding for all documents saved as text files, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DefaultTextEncoding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置文本编码的所有文档另存为文本文件，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DefaultTextEncoding%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的文档编码到 Western 如果文档保存为文本文件。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineEndingType" /> 常数，该常数指示 Microsoft Office Word 如何在另存为文本文件的文档中标记分行符和换段符。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineEndingType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineEndingType" /> 值之一。
