trans-unit.source: Switches form design mode on or off.
trans-unit.target: 打开或关闭窗体设计模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to track formatting changes when change tracking is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更改跟踪打开时是否跟踪格式设置更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to track formatting changes when change tracking is turned on; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在更改跟踪打开时要跟踪格式设置更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to mark moved text when change tracking is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更改跟踪打开时是否标记移动的文本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to mark moved text when change tracking is turned on; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在更改跟踪打开时要标记移动的文本，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, when change tracking is turned on, moved text is marked as deleted and inserted.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，启用更改跟踪后，移动的文本标记为已删除和插入。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.TrackMoves%2A> property is `true`, moved text is marked as moved, and the text in the original location is marked with strikethrough formatting.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.TrackMoves%2A>属性是`true`、 移动的文本标记为已移动，并且在原始位置的文本是带有删除线格式。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the **Track Moves** check box in the **Track Change Options** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于**跟踪移动**中的复选框**跟踪更改选项**对话框。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether changes are tracked in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否跟踪文档中的更改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether changes are tracked in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否跟踪文档中的更改。

trans-unit.source: The path of the XSLT file.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> applies the transformation only to the data in the document, excluding Microsoft Office Word XML.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则仅向文档中的数据（不包括 Microsoft Office Word XML）应用转换。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> applies the transform to the entire document, including Word XML.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则向整个文档（包括 Word XML）应用转换。

trans-unit.source: Default value is true.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 true。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) file to the document and replaces the document with the results.
trans-unit.target: 向文档应用指定的可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 文件，并用结果替换文档。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example transforms only the data in the document using the specified XSLT file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例转换仅使用指定的 XSLT 文件文档中的数据。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the CustomTransform.xslt file exists at the root of the C directory.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定 CustomTransform.xslt 文件位于 C 目录的根目录。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the document type (template or document).
trans-unit.target: 获取文档类型（模板或文档）。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDocumentType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDocumentType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message that shows the document type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一条消息，显示文档的类型。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: The number of actions to be undone.
trans-unit.target: 要撤消的操作的数目。

trans-unit.source: The default is to undo the last action.
trans-unit.target: 默认设置是撤消上一个操作。

trans-unit.source: Undoes the last action or a sequence of actions, which are displayed in the **Undo** list.
trans-unit.target: 撤消上一个操作或者一系列操作，这些操作显示在“撤消”列表中。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the actions were successfully undone.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作已成功撤消，则返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Clears the list of actions that can be undone for the document.
trans-unit.target: 清除可对该文档撤消的操作的列表。

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the list of items that appears when you click the arrow beside the **Undo** button on the **Standard** toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 与在单击“标准”工具栏上“撤消”按钮旁边的箭头时出现的项列表相对应。

trans-unit.source: Include this method after a method in your code to keep Word object model actions from appearing in the **Undo** box.
trans-unit.target: 将此方法包含在你的代码，以防出现在中的 Word 对象模型操作中的方法后**撤消**框。

trans-unit.source: The password used to protect the document.
trans-unit.target: 要用来保护文档的密码。

trans-unit.source: Passwords are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 密码区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the document is protected with a password and the correct password is not supplied, a dialog box prompts the user for the password.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档受密码保护而且用户没有提供正确的密码，则会显示一个对话框，提示用户输入正确的密码。

trans-unit.source: Removes protection from the document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除保护功能。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications.
trans-unit.target: 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。

trans-unit.source: If the document is not protected, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果未受保护文档，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Unprotect%2A> method to remove protection from the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Unprotect%2A>方法以从文档中删除保护。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that the password variable `securelyStoredPassword` was obtained from user input.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定在密码变量`securelyStoredPassword`通过用户输入。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Provides you with an opportunity to remove password protection from the document and enable cached data to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 使用户有机会从文档移除密码保护并能保存缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in a document-level project for Word if your document is protected by using a password, and it contains cached data that might be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法在文档级项目中的 Word 文档受密码保护，并且它包含可能在运行时更改的缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: In your implementation of this method, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Unprotect%2A> method to temporarily unprotect the document.
trans-unit.target: 在你实现此方法中，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.Unprotect%2A>方法暂时取消保护文档。

trans-unit.source: By default, changes to cached data in a password-protected document are not persisted when the document is saved.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，对受密码保护的文档中的缓存数据的更改不会保留在保存文档时。

trans-unit.source: To save changes to the cached data, you must override the following methods in your project:
trans-unit.target: 若要将更改保存到缓存的数据，必须在你的项目中重写以下方法：

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When the document is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method.
trans-unit.target: 保存文档后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Add code to this method that temporarily unprotects the document.
trans-unit.target: 将代码添加到此方法的暂时取消保护文档。

trans-unit.source: This enables changes to the cached data to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 这使对缓存的数据要保存更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A>。

trans-unit.source: After the document is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method.
trans-unit.target: 保存文档后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Add code to this method that reapplies protection to the document.
trans-unit.target: 将代码添加到此方法的重新应用到文档的保护。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Cache Data in a Password-Protected Document](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Password-Protected 文档中缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.UnprotectDocument%2A> method to temporarily unprotect the document so that changes to the cached data can be saved.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>方法暂时取消保护文档，以便可以保存到缓存的数据的更改。

trans-unit.source: The example first saves the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectionType%2A> value, so that the same type of protection can be reapplied later in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例首先将保存当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectionType%2A>值，以便可以更高版本中重新应用相同类型的保护<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.ProtectDocument%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code assumes that the password is stored in a field named `securelyStoredPassword`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码假定该密码存储在名为的字段中`securelyStoredPassword`。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Copies all styles from the attached template into the document, overwriting any existing styles in the document that have the same name.
trans-unit.target: 将所附加模板中的所有样式复制到文档中，并覆盖文档中现有的同名样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the styles in the document are updated to match the styles in the attached template each time the document is opened.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否更新文档样式，以便在每次打开文档时都与所附加的模板中的样式相匹配。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the styles in the document are updated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对文档样式进行更新，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Updates the keyword and comment text in the **Properties** dialog box to reflect the AutoSummary content for the document.
trans-unit.target: 更新“属性”对话框中的关键字和注释文本，以反映文档的自动摘要内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use the default math settings when creating new equations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在创建新公式时使用默认数学设置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the default math settings when creating new equations; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在创建新公式时使用默认数学设置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the document or application was created or opened by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示文档或应用程序是否该用户创建或打开。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document or application was created or opened by the user; <see langword="false" /> if the document or application was created or opened programmatically from another Microsoft Office application with the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Documents.Open(System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@)" /> method or the <c>VBA.Interaction.CreateObject</c> or <c>VBA.Interaction.GetObject</c> method.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果创建或由用户; 打开文档或应用程序<see langword="false" />如果文档或应用程序创建或从具有的其他 Microsoft Office 应用程序以编程方式打开<see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Documents.Open(System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@)" />方法或<c>VBA。Interaction.CreateObject</c>或<c>VBA。Interaction.GetObject</c>方法。

trans-unit.source: If Microsoft Office Word is visible to the user, or if you use the `UserControl` property of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase> object from within a Word code customization, this property will always return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 可见给用户，或如果你使用`UserControl`属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase>对象中的 Word 代码自定义项，此属性将始终返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Sets a password for saving changes to the document.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个用来保存对文档所做更改的密码。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications.
trans-unit.target: 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.WritePassword%2A> property to a password and then saves the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.WritePassword%2A>属性的密码，然后保存文档。

trans-unit.source: The next time the document is opened the password will be requested.
trans-unit.target: 将请求的下次打开该文档时密码。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the `securePassword` parameter is a secure password obtained from user input.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定`securePassword`参数是从用户输入获取的安全密码。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示文档是否用写密码保护。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document is protected with a write password; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档用写密码保护，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user adds a new XML element to a document.
trans-unit.target: 在用户向文档添加新的 XML 元素时发生。

trans-unit.source: If more than one element is added to the document at the same time (for example, when cutting and pasting XML), the event is raised for each element that is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时向文档添加多个元素（例如，在剪切和粘贴 XML 时），则会针对插入的每个元素引发该事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLAfterInsert> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLBeforeDelete> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLAfterInsert>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLBeforeDelete>事件。

trans-unit.source: The code displays a message before an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> is deleted from the document and after an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> is added to the document.
trans-unit.target: 代码将显示一条消息之前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>从文档和之后删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>添加到文档。

trans-unit.source: To test this code example, use the **XML Structure** task pane to add XML elements to the document, and then experiment with the **Undo Typing** and **Redo Typing** options on the **Edit** menu.
trans-unit.target: 若要测试此代码示例，请使用**XML 结构**任务窗格以向文档中，添加 XML 元素，然后进行试用**撤消键入**和**重做键入**上**编辑**菜单。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document is mapped to a valid XML schema.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档映射到有效的 XML 架构。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user deletes an XML element from a document.
trans-unit.target: 在用户从文档中删除 XML 元素时发生。

trans-unit.source: If more than one element is deleted from the document at the same time (for example, when cutting and pasting XML), the event is raised for each element that is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时从文档中删除多个元素（例如，在剪切和粘贴 XML 时），则会针对删除的每个元素引发该事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLAfterInsert> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLBeforeDelete> events.

trans-unit.target: 代码将显示一条消息之前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>从文档和之后删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>添加到文档。

trans-unit.source: To test this code example, use the **XML Structure** task pane to add XML elements to the document, and then experiment with the **Undo Typing** and **Redo Typing** options on the **Edit** menu.
trans-unit.target: 若要测试此代码示例，请使用**XML 结构**任务窗格以向文档中，添加 XML 元素，然后进行试用**撤消键入**和**重做键入**上**编辑**菜单。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document is mapped to a valid XML schema.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档映射到有效的 XML 架构。

trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether to hide the XML namespaces in the list of elements in the **XML Structure** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示是否在“XML 结构”任务窗格中的元素列表中隐藏 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the XML schema namespace for elements is not shown to the right of the element name; <see langword="false" /> if the XML schema namespace is shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素的 XML 架构命名空间未显示在元素名的右侧，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果显示 XML 架构命名空间，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` might be helpful when multiple schemas that contain similar or identical element names are attached to the same document.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`false`时包含类似或相同的元素名称的多个架构附加到同一文档可能很有帮助。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中所有 XML 元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents the collection of all XML elements within the document.

trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word saves only the XML data or the entire document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是仅保存 XML 数据还是保存整个文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Word should save only the XML data when the document is saved as xml; <see langword="false" /> if the entire document should be saved.
trans-unit.target: 如果在将文档另存为 XML 时 Word 应当仅保存 XML 数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果应当保存整个文档，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path and file name for the Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) to apply when a user saves the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在用户保存文档时应用的可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: The path and file name for the Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) to apply when a user saves the document.
trans-unit.target: 要在用户保存文档时应用的可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A> property is only applicable when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A>属性才适用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A> property is set to `false`, Microsoft Office Word will ignore the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A>属性设置为`false`，Microsoft Office Word 将忽略<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLSchemaReferences" /> 集合，该集合表示附加到文档的架构。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLSchemaReferences" /> collection that represents the schemas attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLSchemaReferences" /> 集合，表示附加到文档的架构。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示每个文档中引用的 XML 架构的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents all nodes in the document that have validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中有验证错误的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents all nodes in the document that have validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，表示文档中有验证错误的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of each child node of the root element in the document to a string, and then displays the names of the nodes that have validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例在为一个字符串，文档中设置的根元素的每个子节点的值，然后显示具有验证错误的节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, any node that maps to a schema element with an integer type will report a violation error.
trans-unit.target: 例如，映射到具有整数类型的架构元素的任何节点将报告冲突错误。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether error message text is generated from the built-in Microsoft Office Word error messages or from the Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) 5.0 component included with Office.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示错误消息文本是从内置的 Microsoft Office Word 错误消息生成，还是从包含在 Office 中的 Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) 5.0 组件生成。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if error message text is generated from the MSXML 5.0 component; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果错误信息文本是从 MSXML 5.0 组件生成的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Using advanced error messages from the MSXML 5.0 component provides more specific error messages.
trans-unit.target: 使用从 MSXML 5.0 组件的高级的错误消息提供更具体的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: There are approximately 500 error messages provided through the XML Core Services that are accessible when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLShowAdvancedErrors%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 有大约 500 错误消息都可以访问 XML Core Services 通过提供<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLShowAdvancedErrors%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Word has approximately 50 built-in generic schema errors.
trans-unit.target: Word 有大约 50 个内置的常规架构错误。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLShowAdvancedErrors%2A> property is `false`, Word uses the built-in error messages for errors generated in XML documents.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLShowAdvancedErrors%2A>属性是`false`，Word 将内置的错误消息用于在 XML 文档中生成的错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to save a document through an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否通过可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 来保存文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document is saved through an XSLT; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档是通过 XSLT 保存的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A> property to `true`, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A> property to specify the path and file name of the XSLT to use.
trans-unit.target: 设置时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A>属性`true`，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A>属性来指定要使用的 XSLT 路径和文件名。
